original_title: S.B. Dissanayake says state mechanism is no longer functioning properly
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Podujan Peramuna (SLPP) parliamentarian S.B. Dissanayake alleges that the state mechanism is no longer functioning properly.
The MP points out that no matter how hard the President tried, some activities could not be implemented due to the shortcomings of the government’s mechanism.
MP Dissanayake made these comments while joining a press briefing held in Colombo yesterday (May 20).
